verses.text: Give unto the Lᴏʀᴅ, O ye mighty, give unto the Lᴏʀᴅ glory and strength.
Give unto the Lᴏʀᴅ the glory due unto his name; worship the Lᴏʀᴅ in the beauty of holiness.
The voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ is upon the waters: the God of glory thundereth: the Lᴏʀᴅ is upon many waters.
The voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ is powerful; the voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ is full of majesty.
The voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ breaketh the cedars; yea, the Lᴏʀᴅ breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
The voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ divideth the flames of fire.
The voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ shaketh the wilderness; the Lᴏʀᴅ shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
The voice of the Lᴏʀᴅ maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory.
The Lᴏʀᴅ sitteth upon the flood; yea, the Lᴏʀᴅ sitteth King for ever.
The Lᴏʀᴅ will give strength unto his people; the Lᴏʀᴅ will bless his people with peace.
